body_html: @albanD Thanks for your response, exactly the same question, but I actually want some remedies before the pytorch updated for RTX 2080 Ti support. I even compiled pytorch from source, but new problems come about. Whenever I call torch.cuda, it get stuck and hanging forever.

body: @albanD Thanks for your response, exactly the same question, but I actually want some remedies before the pytorch updated for RTX 2080 Ti support. I even compiled pytorch from source, but new problems come about. Whenever I call torch.cuda, it get stuck and hanging forever.
